amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to limit the eligibility to hold a noncommercial license to those that serve an educational, instructional, cultural, or educational religious purpose.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made in order by H. Res. 527 to clarify that the service obligations of noncommercial broadcast stations are required to frame certain programs in an educational format.
